name: LeadBoxer
author: LeadBoxer

sections.description:
LeadBoxer is a Sales Leads Generation App, enabling your B2B sales-team to act on enriched data as it becomes available, in real-time. We provide a task-oriented (mobile) App that shows you the businesses who visited your site, and provide you with ways to contact them. Contact qualified leads and existing clients at the right time to improve sales.

By utilizing online (big) data and user-behaviour, we provide sales agents with a task- oriented mobile and desktop application to increase sales for both new leads and/or existing clients
sections.installation:
To install the plugin, either add the plug-in via your WordPress admin plugin section, upload the .zip file using the plugin installer, or SFTP the files over to your wp-content/plugins/ directory and activate it.

Configuration Options
To make the plugin work correctly, you need to enter your registered site name. you can set this setting under the Settings -> LeadBoxer page
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

To install the plugin, either add the plug-in via your WordPress admin plugin section, upload the .zip file using the plugin installer, or SFTP the files over to your wp-content/plugins/ directory and activate it.

Configuration Options
To make the plugin work correctly, you need to enter your registered site name. you can set this setting under the Settings -> LeadBoxer page

Do i need an LeadBoxer (trial) account to use this plugin

yes

Will this track every page on my WordPress website?

Yes, all pages except the admin pages.

1.0

short_description: This plugin can be used to add the LeadBoxer tracking code to a Wordpress site
